Unfortunately, ever weakening and greedy governments and people worship the dollar rather then respecting what keeps them alive.  The result, climate  wise is obvious. But the naysayers, mostly rich and powerful deny the science, and spread their misinformation in their quest for the dollar and power.

CO2 is a trace gas in the atmosphere only 0.04 percent, but the IPCC say that CO2 is a dangerous GHG because it absorbs and emits strongly at 15 microns.  According to Wien's displacement law 15 microns has a corresponding temperature of -80⁰ C.  The troposphere, that's the part of the atmosphere we live in, is defined by molecules with a temperature of -60⁰ C and above.  Emissions of IR from CO2 @ 15 microns cannot heat any molecules in the troposphere. That would violate the laws of physics.
It is the sun that drives the climate on earth and not humans or our carbon emissions.

CNN workers were saying during 2020 that as soon as lockdowns and covid subsides, they will launch into full time global warming coverage. This is all mainstream media too no doubt. because what they need are another global scale, vague yet catastrophic dangers. to keep us unable to act. a vague threat means there are no clear ways to make meaningful progress to solve, leading to anxiety and depression. also meaning overwhelming resources go towards efforts claiming to tackle it, instead of putting them towards clearer, solvable problems, which in turn would help to solve environmental crises'. 
After 15 minutes of doom and gloom, we are told our best option is mitigation and adaptation. no solutions. No one at the UN seems to think its conceivable that we are able to solve this problem? how is any of this type of messaging helpful? If the problems are so dire, and the world is the richest its ever been, how about we go about funding research into actionable plans, to solve these problems.
